headline: How FIS is responding to the stablecoin wave
summary: Unlike rival Fiserv, the bank technology company does not plan to issue its own coin immediately, but it does feel the lure of the broader digital asset market.

raw.headline: How FIS is responding to the stablecoin wave
raw.summary: Unlike rival Fiserv, the bank technology company does not plan to issue its own coin immediately, but it does feel the lure of the broader digital asset market.

headline: ICF International Stock Rises 5.4% Since Q2 Earnings Beat
summary: ICFI beats on Q2 earnings but misses revenues as federal government contracts shrink. Shares rally 5.4% post-earnings.

raw.headline: ICF International Stock Rises 5.4% Since Q2 Earnings Beat
raw.summary: ICFI beats on Q2 earnings but misses revenues as federal government contracts shrink. Shares rally 5.4% post-earnings.

headline: Xerox Holdings Stock Declines 2.8% Since Q2 Earnings Miss
summary: XRX posts a Q2 loss and shrinking margins, missing estimates for both earnings and revenues as shares tumble 2.8% post-earnings.

raw.headline: Xerox Holdings Stock Declines 2.8% Since Q2 Earnings Miss
raw.summary: XRX posts a Q2 loss and shrinking margins, missing estimates for both earnings and revenues as shares tumble 2.8% post-earnings.

headline: Small Business Sales Tick Up in July, Driven by Higher Average Ticket Sizes
summary: MILWAUKEE, August 04, 2025--Fiserv, Inc. (NYSE: FI), a leading global provider of payments and financial services technology, has published the Fiserv Small Business Index for July 2025, with the seasonally-adjusted Index rising 1 point to 149.
